name: Myra Dress-Up
description:
-Each girl has a doll and we decide to increase our collection of games for girls with more fashion games and the first one is called Princess Doll Fashion Dress up . This time is about unusual dress up games because you will transform your Princess Doll with a street fashion style . Maybe your princess wants to try some new clothes and accessories and she needs your help to match all these and make your doll looks fabulous !

-Start one of the best dress up games of 2016 and Create your own princess and help her to get best look like Mermaid,

-All fashion experts know that hairstyle is very important ! Choose for your princess doll various hairstyles and you can try more colors like blonde hair or brown hair or what you like . Do not forget that she must look very pretty ! After that you have a big closet to choose various and colorful dresses for your princess doll . Blouses and shirts pants and skirts

- all kind of clothes are in this closet from our fashion games . Only your fashion games skills and imagination decide what should to wear the princess doll ! Combine the colors and the models of all clothes in one of the biggest dress up games ! dress up, how to dress up, Fashion, hairstyles, haircut, dress, girls, new looks, models, makeup, Wedding DressUp, party DressUp,

How to Play:
- Use the touch screen to choose outfits for the doll to wear.
- Dress up the model by choosing dresses, shoes and trendy accessories.
- Transform your Princess Doll to famous princesses

What's Inside:
★More than 20 tops
★More than 20 skirts
★More than 20 dresses
★More than 10 pairs of stocks
★More than 20 different hairstyles and hair colors
★7 attractive pairs of shoes

Features:
★ share your dress up girls easily over Facebook or E-mail.....
★ Beautiful HD illustrations joined with a rich narrative on every page
★ Help a fashion doll get ready for a trip to the mall.
★ Choose outfits, clothes, shoes and trendy bags.
★ Pick out the perfect dress for her to wear.
★ Complete fashion doll makeovers at your fingertips!
★ Enjoy numerous engaging and fun animations on each page.

Wanna have more fun? Having problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you!
